name: Eco Ranger VR
description:
This game was created by Master Students from the University of Utah in the Entertainment Arts and Engineering program in a class called "Rapid Prototype". We were given a prompt to create a serious game using specific art style we were given, Art Deco.

Premise

Every park has the problem where there are some people who do not clean up after themselves, leaving trash everywhere, and in order to help the next generation learn how much work it takes to keep parks clean, we decided to make a game where we can teach kids how to help clean up the parks to embrace the beauty of nature as well as be a good Samaritan. 

How to play

  1. Connect your VR headset to your computer before booting up the game. This works best with an Oculus.
  2. Main Triggers are to use your tools. Left Main Trigger is to teleport.
  3. Right stick is to turn, left stick is to move
  4. Top left Button shows your HUD
  5. Secondary Triggers is to Grab
